org.apache.openmeetings.db.dao

Interface IDataProviderDao<T extends IDataProviderEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationDao, LabelDao, LdapConfigDao, MailMessageDao, OAuth2Dao, OrganisationDao, OrganisationUserDao, PrivateMessageFolderDao, PrivateMessagesDao, RoomDao, ServerDao, UserDao

    public interface IDataProviderDao<T extends IDataProviderEntity>
    General interface to perform CRUD operations on entities
    Author:
    solomax, swagner

          int start,
          int count,
          String order)
        Get a list of instances of T
        Parameters:
        search - - string search criteria to filter entities
        start - - the start to range to retrieve
        count - - maximum instance count to retrieve
        order - - column and sort order
        Returns:
        list of instances in the range specified
